text: VisibleBoth players can see this card while it's in the story.
FleetingAfter resolving, this card is removed from the game.
MorningAt the start of each round, if this is the top card of your discard pile, trigger the following effect.
Sight 4The first X cards in the story are visible to you this round.
Inspire XNext round you have X extra breath.
Inspire XThis round you have X extra breath.
Nourish XThe next card you resolve is worth +X points.
Birth XIf you have a Child in hand, increase its points by X. Otherwise create a 0:X Fleeting Child in hand.
